name: Shakshuka
description: Shakshuka is a delicious Middle Eastern dish made with poached eggs in a flavorful tomato and pepper sauce.
shortInstructions: 1. Saute onions and bell peppers. 2. Add tomatoes and spices. 3. Make wells and crack eggs into them. 4. Cook until eggs are set.

name: Italian Tomato Sauce
description: A classic Italian tomato sauce, perfect for pasta dishes and pizza.
shortInstructions: 1. Saute garlic and onions. 2. Add tomatoes, basil, oregano, salt, and sugar. 3. Simmer until thickened.

name: Chicken Biryani
description: Chicken Biryani is a popular Indian rice dish made with flavorful spices and tender chicken.
shortInstructions: 1. Marinate chicken with yogurt and spices. 2. Cook rice with spices. 3. Layer chicken and rice. 4. Cook on low heat until done.

name: Tonkatsu
description: Tonkatsu is a popular Japanese dish made with breaded and deep-fried pork cutlets.
shortInstructions: 1. Season pork chops. 2. Coat with flour, dip in beaten eggs, and coat with panko. 3. Fry until golden brown. 4. Serve with Tonkatsu sauce and cabbage.

name: Fried Rice
ingredientList: 1 cup cooked chicken or shrimp, chopped
description: Fried Rice is a popular Chinese dish made with stir-fried rice, vegetables, and meat or shrimp.
shortInstructions: 1. Heat oil in a pan and scramble eggs. 2. Add garlic, peas, and carrots. 3. Stir in cooked rice and chicken/shrimp. 4. Season with soy sauce and oyster sauce. 5. Garnish with green onions.

name: Gnocchi
description: Gnocchi is a classic Italian pasta made with potato dumplings served with a butter and sage sauce.
shortInstructions: 1. Cook gnocchi in boiling water until they float. 2. In a separate pan, melt butter and add sage leaves. 3. Toss cooked gnocchi in the butter sauce. 4. Serve with grated Parmesan and season with salt and pepper.

name: Aalu ka Bharta
description: Aalu ka Bharta is a delicious Indian side dish made with mashed potatoes and aromatic spices.
shortInstructions: 1. Heat oil in a pan and add cumin seeds. 2. Add chopped onions and green chilies. 3. Stir in mashed potatoes and spices. 4. Cook until the flavors meld. 5. Garnish with fresh coriander leaves.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
ingredientList: 1 lb boneless chicken, cut into pieces
description: Chicken Tikka Masala is a popular Indian curry dish made with marinated chicken cooked in a rich tomato-based sauce.
shortInstructions: 1. Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for at least 1 hour. 2. Grill or bake the marinated chicken until cooked. 3. In a separate pan, heat ghee and saut√© ginger-garlic paste. 4. Add tomato puree and spices. 5. Stir in heavy cream and cooked chicken. 6. Garnish with fresh coriander leaves.

name: White Sauce Macaroni
ingredientList: Salt and black pepper to taste
description: White Sauce Macaroni is a creamy and cheesy pasta dish made with a rich white sauce.
shortInstructions: 1. Cook macaroni according to package instructions. 2. In a separate pan, melt butter and stir in flour to make a roux. 3. Gradually whisk in milk and let it thicken. 4. Add shredded cheese and seasonings. 5. Toss cooked macaroni in the white sauce. 6. Garnish with fresh parsley.

name: Chicken Teriyaki
ingredientList: 1 lb boneless chicken thighs, cut into pieces
Sesame seeds and chopped green onions for garnish
description: Chicken Teriyaki is a popular Japanese dish made with tender pieces of chicken glazed in a sweet and savory teriyaki sauce.
shortInstructions: 1. In a bowl, combine soy sauce, mirin, sake, brown sugar, ginger, and garlic. 2. Marinate chicken in the sauce for at least 30 minutes. 3. In a pan, heat vegetable oil and cook marinated chicken until browned. 4. In a separate bowl, mix cornstarch and water to make a slurry. 5. Pour the slurry into the pan to thicken the sauce. 6. Garnish with sesame seeds and chopped green onions.

name: Peanut Noodles
description: Peanut Noodles is a flavorful and creamy Asian dish made with peanut butter sauce.
shortInstructions: 1. Cook spaghetti noodles according to package instructions. 2. In a bowl, whisk together peanut butter, soy sauce, rice vinegar, sesame oil, honey, garlic, ginger, and red pepper flakes. 3. Toss cooked noodles in the peanut sauce. 4. Garnish with chopped green onions, chopped peanuts, and fresh cilantro.

name: Doughnuts
description: Doughnuts are a classic and delicious sweet treat loved worldwide.
shortInstructions: 1. In a bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt. 2. In a separate bowl, mix milk, melted butter, egg, and vanilla extract. 3. Combine wet and dry ingredients to form a dough. 4. Roll out the dough and cut into doughnut shapes. 5. Heat oil in a pan and fry the doughnuts until golden brown. 6. Coat with powdered sugar.

name: Chicken Wontons
description: Chicken Wontons are delicious Chinese dumplings filled with flavorful ground chicken.
shortInstructions: 1. In a bowl, mix ground chicken, soy sauce, oyster sauce, sesame oil, ginger, garlic, and green onion. 2. Place a spoonful of filling onto a wonton wrapper. 3. Moisten the edges with water and fold into a triangle or desired shape. 4. Seal the wontons tightly. 5. Heat oil in a pan and fry the wontons until golden and crispy.
